response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $15,000 to you, based on your needs and preferences. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special price of $14,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 14000}
